DOC.brief_title: Registry Treatment Upper Urinary Tract Tumours
DOC.detailed_description: This observational international multi-center study data consecutive patient UUT tumour collect . Centers every continent may apply participation registry . Data collect consecutive patient five year period . Patients ' data baseline visit , one year , three year five year inclusion registry record , well data intra- postoperative complication , recurrence survival whole study period . Data participating center collect electronic case report form ( eCRFs ) , use online Data Management System ( DMS ) , locate maintain CROES Office .
